name: Too Many Shortcodes
author: bitacre

sections.description:
View or change the trigger text, enable or disable individual shortcodes, see the optional arguments and explaination links for each shortcode, all on one page. New shortcodes added with every update.

Readme Generator

  • This plugin’s readme.txt file was generated by the bitacre Readme Generator for WordPress Plugins.

Support

  • Plugin Homepage
  • plugins@shinraholdings.com

Donations

Donations are graciously accepted to support the continued development and maintenance of this and other plugins. We currently accept Paypal and kind words.
sections.installation:
1. Download the latest zip file and extract the too-many-shortcodes directory.
  2. Upload this directory inside your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate ‘Too Many Shortcodes’ on the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • added [pluginlink], shortcode for displaying links to other hosted WP plugins

1.1.0

  • First released version.
  • There may still be bugs, but I can’t find any.
